sect2.title: Rotate 180 degrees
sect2.para: The Rotate 180 degrees command rotates the active layer by 180° around the center of the layer, with no loss of pixel data. The shape of the layer is not altered. Since the layers have " a rectangular shape, a 180° rotation only invert them and they can't " extend beyond the image limits.

listitem.para:
You can access this command from the image menubar through
Layer Transform Rotate 180 degrees .
